sentences.en: After five days of heavy rain the Telle river was a raging torrent (= a very violent torrent ) .
sentences.cn: 下了五天的大雨之后，泰勒河急流汹涌。

sentences.en: After the winter rains, the stream becomes a raging torrent .
An angry torrent rolls thunderously on for a thousand li.
Elinor could no longer witness this torrent of unresisted grief in silence.
sentences.cn: 眼见这不可遏止的悲恸勃然爆发,埃莉诺不可能保持沉默了.

sentences.en: He was answered with a torrent of malediction.
sentences.cn: 他得到的回答是滔滔不绝的诅咒。

sentences.en: He was answered with a torrent of oaths.
sentences.cn: 他所得到的回报是一连串的咒骂声.

sentences.en: Her pent - up anger was released in a torrent of words.
sentences.cn: 她压抑的愤怒以滔滔不绝的话爆发了出来.

sentences.en: Hill let loose a torrent of abuse against those who prosecuted his case.
sentences.cn: 希尔对控告他的人破口大骂起来。

sentences.en: The field trip involved crossing a raging torrent.
sentences.cn: 实地考察时要穿过一条水流湍急的河。

sentences.en: The river Tiber was no longer a foaming torrent overflowing the plains.
sentences.cn: 台伯河已不再是漫溢平原的泛起泡沫的急流.

sentences.en: The scorching torrent was enough to wither the face of the corpse.
sentences.cn: 这一阵激流似的痛骂,大可以使死人面上失色.

sentences.en: The stream had become a raging torrent.
sentences.cn: 小溪变成了一条汹涌的急流。

sentences.en: The torrent scoured ( out ) a channel ( down the hillside ).
sentences.cn: 急流 ( 沿着山腰 ) 冲出一条水道.

sentences.en: The trip involved crossing a raging torrent.
sentences.cn: 旅途中要穿过一条水势凶猛的急流。

sentences.en: They were jostled and subjected to a torrent of verbal abuse.
sentences.cn: 他们被推来搡去，受到大肆的谩骂攻击。

sentences.en: Torrents of water gushed into the reservoir.
We immediately barraged the enemy stronghold with a torrent of rifle fire.
sentences.cn: 我们立刻用密集的步枪火力攻击敌人据点.

trans.tran_cn: 奔流，急流，爆发，迸发，连续不断，（质问等的）连发
trans.tran_en: a large amount of water moving very quickly and strongly in a particular direction
